title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Village Development Instructional Design Based on Papua Regional Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze the cultural context of the Papua region (Meraluke area), including the Pakas Animism leadership system, and apply it to village development planning
Design development strategies harmonized with local residents' lifestyles (e.g., coastal Malin Animist tribes, inland Koa tribes) using historical and anthropological analysis methods
Establish an implementation plan reflecting cultural considerations in the design and evaluation stages using a culture-based village development framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
